description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Puzzle game combining the sliding mechanic of games like Three's and 2048 with the more traditional 3 in a row matching game play. Includes 100 level challenge mode and global scoreboards.
